sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import Header from '../components/header' import FeatureCard from '../components/feature-card' import './home.css' import Table from './table' import AddPerson from './addPerson' import DeletePerson from './deletePerson' const Home = (props) => { const defaultPersonData = { role: 'manager', name: null, surname: null, email: null, phone: null, gehalt: null, description: null, skype: null, KW: null, schulungsleitIDs: null, managerIDs: null, niveau: null, gruppenID: null, zahlungsID: null, schuelerManagerID: null } const [personData, setPersonData] = useState(defaultPersonData); const [data, setData] = useState(null); const [schulungsleitIDs, setSchulungsleitIDs] = React.useState([]); const [managerIDs, setManagerIDs] = React.useState([]); const [gruppenIDs, setGruppenIDs] = React.useState([]); const [zahlungIDs, setZahlungIDs] = React.useState([]); const [userAdded, setUserAdded] = useState(0); const [userDeleted, setUserDeleted] = useState(0); const [idToDelete, setIdToDelete] = useState(null); const personChangeHandler = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setPersonData(prevState => ({...prevState, [name]: value})); } const personRoleChangeHandler = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setPersonData(prevState => { if (prevState.role === value) { return prevState; } else { document.getElementById('addPerson').reset(); setUserAdded(0); return defaultPersonData; }}); } const idToDeleteHandler = e => { const {value} = e.target; setIdToDelete(value); } const addPerson = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = personData.name; const surname = personData.surname; const email = personData.email; const phone = personData.phone.replace('+', '%2b'); switch(personData.role) { case 'manager': const gehalt = personData.gehalt; const description = personData.description; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPerson&role=manager&name=${name}&surname=${surname}&email=${email}&phone=${phone}&gehalt=${gehalt}&description=${description}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .then(() => { setUserAdded(1); setPersonData(defaultPersonData); document.getElementById('addPerson').reset(); }) break; case 'lehrer': const skype = personData.skype; const KW = personData.KW; const schulungsleitIDs = personData.schulungsleitIDs; const managerIDs = personData.managerIDs; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPerson&role=lehrer&name=${name}&surname=${surname}&email=${email}&phone=${phone}&skype=${skype}&KW=${KW}&schulungsleitIDs=${schulungsleitIDs}&managerIDs=${managerIDs}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .then(() => { setUserAdded(1); setPersonData(defaultPersonData); document.getElementById('addPerson').reset(); }) break; case 'schueler': const niveau = personData.skype; const gruppenIDs = personData.KW; const zahlungIDs = personData.schulungsleitIDs; const schuelerManagerIDs = personData.managerIDs; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPerson&role=schueler&name=${name}&surname=${surname}&email=${email}&phone=${phone}&niveau=${niveau}&KW=${KW}&gruppenIDs=${gruppenIDs}&zahlungIDs=${zahlungIDs}&managerIDs=${schuelerManagerIDs}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .then(() => { setUserAdded(1); setPersonData(defaultPersonData); document.getElementById('addPerson').reset(); }) break; } } const deletePerson = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?deletePerson&id=${idToDelete}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data); Object.keys(data).length > 1 ? setUserDeleted(1) : setUserDeleted(-1); document.getElementById('deletePerson').reset(); }) } React.useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setData(data); }).then(() => fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?getSchulungsleitIDs=true`)) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setSchulungsleitIDs(data); }).then(() => fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?getGruppenIDs=true`)) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setGruppenIDs(data); }).then(() => fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?getZahlungIDs=true`)) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setZahlungIDs(data); }).then(() => fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?getManagerIDs=true`)) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setManagerIDs(data); }).catch(err => console.log(err)); }, [userAdded, userDeleted]); return (
